channel.title: Research on Website of Jane Doe
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Website of Jane Doe

item.title: Catastrophic Forgetting in Similarity Learning
item.description: This research project looks at the impact of catastrophic forgetting in similarity learning.

item.title: Surrogate Assisted Agent Based Modelling
item.description: This research project looks at the surrogate assisted agent based modelling of COVID-19.

item.title: Nedbank Research Chair
item.description: I currently hold the Nedbank Research and Innovation Chair. The Chair is housed at the University of Johannesburg’s Institute for Intelligent systems.
